title: #460 Teacher's Pet with Amy Shanker
itunes:title: Teacher's Pet with Amy Shanker
description:
Comedian and former Chicago inner-city school teacher Amy Shanker talks to me a 2.2 GPA high school graduate about what it was like being a teacher. Spoiler alert: She did not love it. Still spent 10 years doing it so that’s gotta tell you something about our chances at a good education when our educators are too stupid to quit a job they hate.

Police - Don’t Stand So

Coolio - Gangsta’s Paradise
